meta.title: History, Heritage and Legacy | Ping PLD
meta.description: Learn how Ping’s legacy of golf club design and engineering led to Ping PLD custom, limited edition and milled putters.

pageBanner.label: Heritage
pageBanner.title: An engineering company that started with a putter.

postBannerText.text: From founder Karsten Solheim’s garage to the Hall of Fame.

historySection.title: It all started with a putter.
historySection.description: Karsten Solheim might not have invented the putter, but he did modernize it more than 60 years ago.And his influence can still be seen in just about every putter on the market today. While experimentingin his Redwood City, Calif., garage, his theory ofheel-toe balance revolutionized putter design.
